downloadTitle: Hotfix for Microsoft Application Request Routing Version 2.5 for IIS 8.0  (KB 2785586)
downloadDescription: Hotfix for Microsoft Application Request Routing Version 2.5 for IIS 8.0  (KB 2785586)
detailsSection: This hotfix addresses a deadlock in Application Request Routing Version 2.5. ARR can get into deadlock if there is another IIS managed module in request pipeline of ARR server. More details information about this hotfix is in the Microsoft Knowledge Base article, 2785586.
systemRequirementsSection:
• Supported Operating Systems: Windows Server 2012
  • This update applies to the following product: Microsoft Application Request Routing Version 2.5 for IIS8
installInstructionSection:
Click the Download button on this page to start the download, then do one of the followings:
  • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
  • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, clieck Save or Save this program to disk.
